text: Rouge on Pockmarked Cheeks is the third album by Brazzaville.SF Weekly, House of Tudor The album which was produced by Nigel Godrich was released in 2002.BBC, Nigel Godrich ==Track listing== #"Motel Room" – 4:56 #"Samurai" – 6:25 #"Queenie" – 4:28 #"1980" – 4:50 #"Rainy Night" – 3:12 #"Genoa" – 6:29 #"Trona" – 4:30 #"Xanax and Three Hours of TV" – 3:17 #"High Life" – 3:26 #"N. Koreatown" – 6:20 #"Late Night Lullaby" – 14:34 == References == Category:Brazzaville (US band) albums Category:1998 albums Category:Albums produced by Tony Hoffer Category:Albums produced by Nigel Godrich
title: Rouge on Pockmarked Cheeks
